metadata.title: CVE-2016-5115 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
The avcodec_decode_audio4 function in libavcodec in libavformat 57.34.103, as used in MPlayer, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted mp3 file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-5115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavcodec58 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavdevice58 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavfilter7 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavformat-extra - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavformat-extra58 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavformat58 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavutil56 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libpostproc55 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libswresample3 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libswscale5 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> no details as of 2016-10-18 ebarretto> no details as of 2019-03-01

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2').
